name: American Truck Mechanic Simulator-Auto Repair Shop
name_original: American Truck Mechanic Simulator-Auto Repair Shop
description:
The most awaited truck mechanic game is here now with unique gameplay in a PRO version. NO ADS! 100% COMPLETE GAME!

Repairing and fixing giant trucks requires some serious mechanical skills, So are you up for the challenge? Roll up your sleeves and start working as a trailer truck mechanic in this latest garage simulator. Grab your trucker tools to fix and repair engine of gigantic cargo trailers. In this game you’ll learn to build truck engine starting from scratch. First of all disassemble the faulty truck engine using lifter crane to examine.

Build a powerful 480hp truck using all the latest six cylinder engine parts and rebuild kits. Show your mechanical skills and place crankshaft, piston, flywheel and engine block. Then connect spark plug wires and place cylinder head cover to finish assembling diesel engine. Fix issues like dents on body parts, change flat tyres and install metallic rims with modern tools. Perform paint job to give your truck a brand new look and cover rusted parts. Modify the body parts of american truck and paste trendy vinyl stickers.

In this simulator game you’ll learn to replace truck body parts, tune up engine and modify to increase horsepower and performance. Take assembled truck for a test drive to complete the job . Realistic controls, detailed environment and multiple modification options makes this one of the best truck mechanic game of 2017.

Game Features:
12 extremely challenging time based levels to repair giant trucks
Learn to build truck engine from scratch
Explore open world environment to drive truck
Ultra real truck physics and visually stunning graphics
Smooth controls, immersive sounds & addictive gameplay

Enjoy the unique gameplay and give your feedback to help us improve this game in future releases.
